title: Week 6 Picks Against the Spread, Best Bets, Gambling Advice (Football 10/11)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Pete Prisco and R.J. for Week 6 gambling advice, covering all 13 games on Sunday and Monday. The guys discuss Redskins-Dolphins (5:00), 49ers-Rams (8:05), Eagles-Vikings (10:40), Saints-Jags (18:45), Seahawks-Browns (22:20), Texans-Chiefs (24:45), Lions-Packers (27:10), Falcons-Cardinals (29:20), Panthers-Bucs (35:50), Bengals-Ravens (38:15), Cowboys-Jets (40:30), Titans-Broncos (41:50 and Steelers-Chargers (45:00). 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
